title: Shattered Flail
content:
Shattered Flail Rare 3~8 Damage 1d6+2Bludgeoning Yeenoghu's Gift: Hitting an enemy with this weapon heals the wielder for 1-6 hit points - but they can go Mad if they don't continue hitting an enemy each turn. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A bundle of bones and blood - and a soul-piercing demonic presence - is all that remains of the Flind's flail. You reckon it would make a decent club with a particularly nasty bite. Mace 1.8 190

1d6+2Bludgeoning
